document.heading: District of Columbia Sentencing Improvements Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-202, the “District of Columbia Sentencing Improvements Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-120, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 16, 1982, and December 14, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-286 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
